Address.label: Address
Address.value: 480 PLEASANT STREET,SUITE B300, WATERTOWN, Massachusetts, 02472, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: EyePoint Pharmaceuticals Inc is a pharmaceutical company. It is engaged in developing and commercializing ophthalmic products for the treatment of eye diseases. The company has developed FDA-approved sustained-release treatments in ophthalmology. Its pre-clinical development program is focused on using its core Durasert and Verisome Technology platforms to deliver drugs to treat wet age-related macular degeneration, glaucoma, osteoarthritis, and other diseases.

value.name: Jennifer Leonard
value.title: Chief People Officer & Senior Vice President-IT
